Pinyin1: qǐng nǐ zài lóushàng děng wǒ yīxià 。
Chinese1: 请你在楼上等我一下。
Translate1: Please wait for me upstairs.

Pinyin1: chūlái wánbā ， wǒmen zài jiǔbā děng nǐ 。
Chinese1: 出来玩吧，我们在酒吧等你。
Translate1: They haven't seen each other for seven or eight years.

Pinyin1: wǒmā bùràng wǒ chūqù 。
Chinese1: 我妈不让我出去。
Translate1: My mother won't let me go out.

Pinyin1: zhèshì wǒjiā ， jìnlái bā 。
Chinese1: 这是我家，进来吧。
Translate1: This is my home, come in.

Pinyin1: nà shì nǐ de wòshì ma ？
Chinese1: 那是你的卧室吗？
Translate1: is that your bedroom

Pinyin1: wǒ jīntiān bù huíqu chīfàn 。
Chinese1: 我今天不回去吃饭。
Translate1: I'm not going back for dinner today.

Pinyin1: bùyào ràng tā pǎochūqù 。
Chinese1: 不要让它跑出去。
Translate1: Don't let it get out.

Pinyin1: cóng wǒjiā zǒu guòlái yào bànge xiǎoshí 。
Chinese1: 从我家走过来要半个小时。
Translate1: It takes half an hour to walk from my house.

Pinyin1: nǐ bāolǐ de dōngxi dū ná chūlái le ma ？
Chinese1: 你包里的东西都拿出来了吗？
Translate1: Have you got everything out of your bag?

Pinyin1: kuàidiǎn sòng háizi qù bā ， bié chídào le 。
Chinese1: 快点送孩子去吧，别迟到了。
Translate1: Hurry up and send the kids, don't be late.

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ dài péngyou guòlái ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以带朋友过来吗？
Translate1: Can I bring friends over?

Pinyin1: tāmen dài le yīxiē lǐwù huíqu 。
Chinese1: 他们带了一些礼物回去。
Translate1: They went back with some presents.

Pinyin1: bāng wǒ bǎ zhège xiāngzi bān guòqu 。
Chinese1: 帮我把这个箱子搬过去。
Translate1: Help me move this box over there.

Pinyin1: nǐ méi dàiyǎnjìng ， kàn dé qīngchu ma ？
Chinese1: 你没戴眼镜，看得清楚吗？
Translate1: You don't wear glasses, can you see clearly?

Pinyin1: tā zhème cūxīn ， zuòdéhǎo ma ？
Chinese1: 他这么粗心，做得好吗？
Translate1: He is so careless, is he doing well?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhème cōngming ， kěndìng xuédéhuì 。
Chinese1: 你这么聪明，肯定学得会。
Translate1: You are so smart, you must be able to learn.

Pinyin1: zǎoshang wǔdiǎn chūfā ， háizi men qǐ délái ma ？
Chinese1: 早上五点出发，孩子们起得来吗？
Translate1: Departure at five in the morning, can the kids get up?

Pinyin1: zhème gāo de shān ， nǐ pá dé shàngqu ma ？
Chinese1: 这么高的山，你爬得上去吗？
Translate1: Can you climb such a high mountain?

Pinyin1: nǐ de shēngyīn tàixiǎo le ， wǒmen tīngbujiàn 。
Chinese1: 你的声音太小了，我们听不见。
Translate1: Your voice is too low for us to hear you.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ tàiàn le ， wǒ kànbùqīngchǔ 。
Chinese1: 这里太暗了，我看不清楚。
Translate1: It's too dark in here, I can't see clearly.

Pinyin1: zhège zìxíngchē tàipò le ， shéi dū xiū bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 这个自行车太破了，谁都修不好。
Translate1: This bike is so broken that no one can fix it.

Pinyin1: tā de tuǐ shòushāng le ， zhànbùqǐlái le 。
Chinese1: 她的腿受伤了，站不起来了。
Translate1: Her leg was hurt and she couldn't stand up.

Pinyin1: bāo tàixiǎo le ， shǒujī fàng bù jìnqù 。
Chinese1: 包太小了，手机放不进去。
Translate1: The bag is too small to fit the phone.

Pinyin1: tā zhème xiǎo ， kàndédǒng zhè běnshū ma ？
Chinese1: 她这么小，看得懂这本书吗？
Translate1: She is so young, can she understand this book?

Pinyin1: wǒpà wǒ zuò bùhǎo zhèfèn gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 我怕我做不好这份工作。
Translate1: I'm afraid I can't do the job well.

Pinyin1: zhè běnshū wǒ yīgè xīngqī kěndìng kànde wán 。
Chinese1: 这本书我一个星期肯定看得完。
Translate1: I can definitely read this book in a week.

Pinyin1: nǐ chī hǎolema ？
Chinese1: 你吃好了吗？
Translate1: Have you eaten yet?

Pinyin1: duìbuqǐ ， wǒ jìcuò le shíjiān 。
Chinese1: 对不起，我记错了时间。
Translate1: Sorry, I misremembered the time.

Pinyin1: nǐ lái wǎn le ， wǒmen yǐjīng guānmén le 。
Chinese1: 你来晚了，我们已经关门了。
Translate1: You're late, we're closed.

Pinyin1: tā wánhuài le gēge de wánjù 。
Chinese1: 他玩坏了哥哥的玩具。
Translate1: He spoiled his brother's toys.

Pinyin1: wǒ méi chībǎo 。
Chinese1: 我没吃饱。
Translate1: I am not full.

Pinyin1: wǒmen méi tīng qīngchu ， qǐng zàishuō yībiàn 。
Chinese1: 我们没听清楚，请再说一遍。
Translate1: We didn't catch you, please say it again.

Pinyin1: zhège zì xiěcuò le 。
Chinese1: 这个字写错了。
Translate1: The word is misspelled.

Pinyin1: zhè běnshū nǐ yīdìng yào rènzhēn dìkàn xiàqù 。
Chinese1: 这本书你一定要认真地看下去。
Translate1: You must read this book carefully.

Pinyin1: zhèyàng zuò hěn yǒu yìyì ， nǐ yīnggāi zuò xiàqù 。
Chinese1: 这样做很有意义，你应该做下去。
Translate1: It makes sense to do it, and you should do it.

Pinyin1: tā zǒu le ， yīnwèi tā méiliǎn dài xiàqù le 。
Chinese1: 他走了，因为他没脸待下去了。
Translate1: He left because he had no face to stay any longer.

Pinyin1: nǐ bùnéng zhèyàng shēnghuó xiàqù le 。
Chinese1: 你不能这样生活下去了。
Translate1: You can't live like this anymore.

Pinyin1: zhège gùshi tài wúliáo le ， wǒ tīng bù xiàqù le 。
Chinese1: 这个故事太无聊了，我听不下去了。
Translate1: This story is so boring that I can't listen to it anymore.

Pinyin1: zhège diànyǐng tài bàolì le ， wǒ kànbùxiàqù le 。
Chinese1: 这个电影太暴力了，我看不下去了。
Translate1: This movie is too violent, I can't watch it anymore.

Pinyin1: wǒ gēn tā guòbùxiàqù le ， wǒyào líhūn 。
Chinese1: 我跟他过不下去了，我要离婚。
Translate1: I can't live with him anymore, I want a divorce.

Pinyin1: nǐ zàidǔ xiàqù huì shūguāng de 。
Chinese1: 你再赌下去会输光的。
Translate1: If you keep betting, you'll lose it all.

Pinyin1: nǐ zài hēxiàqù jiù zuì le 。
Chinese1: 你再喝下去就醉了。
Translate1: You'll be drunk if you drink any more.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ zhēnde xǐhuan ， wǒ jiù gěi nǐ mǎi 。
Chinese1: 只要你真的喜欢，我就给你买。
Translate1: As long as you really like it, I will buy it for you.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ nǔlìxuéxí ， jiù huì yǒu jìnbù 。
Chinese1: 只要你努力学习，就会有进步。
Translate1: As long as you study hard, you will make progress.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào yǒu nǐ zài ， wǒ jiù fàngxīn le 。
Chinese1: 只要有你在，我就放心了。
Translate1: As long as you're here, I'm at ease.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào xiàyǔ ， tā jiù huì xīnqíng bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 只要下雨，她就会心情不好。
Translate1: As long as it rains, she will be in a bad mood.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào kàndào māma ， bǎobǎo jiù bù kū le 。
Chinese1: 只要看到妈妈，宝宝就不哭了。
Translate1: As long as it sees its mother, the baby stops crying.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ wánchéng le gōngzuò ， jiù kěyǐ bùyòng jiābān 。
Chinese1: 只要你完成了工作，就可以不用加班。
Translate1: As long as you get the job done, you don't have to work overtime.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ māma tóngyì nǐ qù běijīng ， wǒ jiù méiyǒu yìjiàn 。
Chinese1: 只要你妈妈同意你去北京，我就没有意见。
Translate1: As long as your mother agrees with you to go to Beijing, I have no problem.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào bùdǔchē ， wǒmen jiù néng zhǔnshí dào 。
Chinese1: 只要不堵车，我们就能准时到。
Translate1: As long as there is no traffic jam, we can arrive on time.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ bù shēngqì ， wǒ jiù gàosu nǐ 。
Chinese1: 只要你不生气，我就告诉你。
Translate1: As long as you are not angry, I will tell you.

Pinyin1: zhǐyào nǐ de yāoqiú shì hélǐ de ， wǒmen jiù kěyǐ kǎolǜ 。
Chinese1: 只要你的要求是合理的，我们就可以考虑。
Translate1: As long as your request is reasonable, we can consider it.

Pinyin1: xiǎomínghuā le hěnduō xīnsi cái shèjì chū le zhèzhāng hǎibào 。
Chinese1: 小明花了很多心思才设计出了这张海报。
Translate1: It took Xiao Ming a lot of thought to design this poster.

Pinyin1: tāyòng le hěnduōnián cái yuánliàng le tā de māma 。
Chinese1: 他用了很多年才原谅了他的妈妈。
Translate1: It took him many years to forgive his mother.

Pinyin1: nàběnshū wǒ kàn le liǎngbiàn cái kàn dǒng 。
Chinese1: 那本书我看了两遍才看懂。
Translate1: I read that book twice before I understood it.

Pinyin1: wǒ qù le sāncì běijīng cái jiàndào le nàgè kèhù 。
Chinese1: 我去了三次北京才见到了那个客户。
Translate1: It took me three trips to Beijing to meet that client.

Pinyin1: tā zhǎo le hǎojǐgè yuè cái zhǎodào héshì de fángzi 。
Chinese1: 他找了好几个月才找到合适的房子。
Translate1: He searched for months to find the right house.

Pinyin1: tā zuò wán le gōngkè cái shuìjiào 。
Chinese1: 她做完了功课才睡觉。
Translate1: She didn't go to bed until she finished her homework.

Pinyin1: tā suǒshàng le mén cái xiǎng qǐlai méiyǒu dài yàoshi 。
Chinese1: 他锁上了门才想起来没有带钥匙。
Translate1: He locked the door only to realize he didn't have the key with him.

Pinyin1: wǒ bǎ niúnǎi hēwán le ， cái fāxiàn niúnǎi guòqī le 。
Chinese1: 我把牛奶喝完了，才发现牛奶过期了。
Translate1: I finished my milk only to find out that it was expired.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu duō chīfàn cáinéng chánggāo 。
Chinese1: 只有多吃饭才能长高。
Translate1: You can only grow taller if you eat more.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu duō shuō ， nǐ de zhōngwén cái huì tígāo 。
Chinese1: 只有多说，你的中文才会提高。
Translate1: Only by speaking more will your Chinese improve.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu dàjiā yīqǐ zuò cáinéng chénggōng 。
Chinese1: 只有大家一起做才能成功。
Translate1: Only by doing it together can we succeed.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu xiě wán nǐ de zuòyè cáinéng kàndiànshì 。
Chinese1: 只有写完你的作业才能看电视。
Translate1: Watch TV only after finishing your homework.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu māma zài wǒmen cáinéng chūqùwán 。
Chinese1: 只有妈妈在我们才能出去玩。
Translate1: We can only go out to play when mom is there.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu měitiān pǎobù ， nǐ de shēntǐ cái huì jiànkāng 。
Chinese1: 只有每天跑步，你的身体才会健康。
Translate1: Only by running every day can your body be healthy.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu lǎobǎn tóngyì zhège jiànyì ， wǒmen cáinéng zuò 。
Chinese1: 只有老板同意这个建议，我们才能做。
Translate1: We can only do it if the boss agrees to the suggestion.

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu nǐ chī guò le ， nǐ cáinéng shuō hǎobuhǎo chī 。
Chinese1: 只有你吃过了，你才能说好不好吃。
Translate1: You can only say whether it is good or not if you have eaten it.

Pinyin1: tā yījù huà dū méi shuō 。
Chinese1: 他一句话都没说。
Translate1: He didn't say a word.

Pinyin1: tā yījù zhōngwén dū bùhuì shuō 。
Chinese1: 他一句中文都不会说。
Translate1: He can't speak a word of Chinese.

Pinyin1: wèishénme zhèlǐ yīgè rén dū méiyǒu ？
Chinese1: 为什么这里一个人都没有？
Translate1: Why is there no one here?

Pinyin1: wǒ yīkǒu dū méi chī 。
Chinese1: 我一口都没吃。
Translate1: I didn't eat a bite.

Pinyin1: lái shànghǎi yǐqián ， tā yīgè wàiguó péngyou dū méiyǒu 。
Chinese1: 来上海以前，他一个外国朋友都没有。
Translate1: Before coming to Shanghai, he didn't have any foreign friends.

Pinyin1: tā yīpíng kělè yě méi hē 。
Chinese1: 她一瓶可乐也没喝。
Translate1: She didn't drink a bottle of Coke.

Pinyin1: wǒ yīdiǎn xiāoxi dū bù zhīdào 。
Chinese1: 我一点消息都不知道。
Translate1: I don't know anything about it.

Pinyin1: zhège rén wǒ yīcì dū méijiàn guò 。
Chinese1: 这个人我一次都没见过。
Translate1: I haven't seen this person once.

Pinyin1: zhèyàng de cài wǒ yīcì yě méichīguò 。
Chinese1: 这样的菜我一次也没吃过。
Translate1: I have never eaten such a dish once.

Pinyin1: zhècì huódòng wǒmen gōngsī yīgè rén yě méi cānjiā 。
Chinese1: 这次活动我们公司一个人也没参加。
Translate1: No one from our company participated in this event.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yuèxiǎng yuè shēngqì 。
Chinese1: 我们越想越生气。
Translate1: The more we think about it, the angrier we get.

Pinyin1: wǒ yuè kàn yuè xǐhuan 。
Chinese1: 我越看越喜欢。
Translate1: I like it more and more.

Pinyin1: tā yuè pǎo yuè kuài 。
Chinese1: 他越跑越快。
Translate1: He ran faster and faster.

Pinyin1: yǔyuè xià yuè dà 。
Chinese1: 雨越下越大。
Translate1: The rain is getting heavier.

Pinyin1: tā yuè shuō ， wǒyuè shēngqì 。
Chinese1: 她越说，我越生气。
Translate1: The more she talked, the angrier I got.

Pinyin1: nǐmen yuè kàn wǒ ， wǒyuè jǐnzhāng 。
Chinese1: 你们越看我，我越紧张。
Translate1: The more you look at me, the more nervous I get.

Pinyin1: wǒ yuè zǒu ， tuǐ yuètòng 。
Chinese1: 我越走，腿越痛。
Translate1: The more I walk, the more my legs hurt.

Pinyin1: nǐ yuè ràng háizi xué ， háizi yuè bùxiǎng xué 。
Chinese1: 你越让孩子学，孩子越不想学。
Translate1: The more you let your child learn, the less your child will want to learn.

Pinyin1: tā yuè wèn ， wǒyuè bùxiǎng shuō 。
Chinese1: 他越问，我越不想说。
Translate1: The more he asked, the less I wanted to talk.

Pinyin1: nǐ yuè zhèyàng shuō ， tā yuè bù tīng 。
Chinese1: 你越这样说，他越不听。
Translate1: The more you say this, the less he will listen.

Pinyin1: zhè běnshū wǒ yuè kàn yuè xiǎng kàn 。
Chinese1: 这本书我越看越想看。
Translate1: The more I look at this book, the more I want to read it.

Pinyin1: zhèzhǒng língshí ràng rén yuè chī yuè xiǎng chī 。
Chinese1: 这种零食让人越吃越想吃。
Translate1: This snack makes people want to eat more and more.

Pinyin1: wǒ chī le zhège yào yǐhòu zǒngshì xiǎng shuìjiào ， érqiě yuè shuì yuè xiǎng shuì 。
Chinese1: 我吃了这个药以后总是想睡觉，而且越睡越想睡。
Translate1: After taking this medicine, I always want to sleep, and the more I sleep, the more I want to sleep.

Pinyin1: bǎ shū fàngzài zhuōzi shàng 。
Chinese1: 把书放在桌子上。
Translate1: Put the book on the table.

Pinyin1: tā bǎ wǒ de shǒujī fàngzài tā de bāolǐ le 。
Chinese1: 她把我的手机放在她的包里了。
Translate1: She put my phone in her bag.

Pinyin1: tā bǎ zàng yīfú fàngzài chuáng xiàmiàn le 。
Chinese1: 他把脏衣服放在床下面了。
Translate1: He put the dirty clothes under the bed.

Pinyin1: nǐ shìbùshì bǎ hùzhào fàngzài xínglixiāng lǐ le ？
Chinese1: 你是不是把护照放在行李箱里了？
Translate1: Did you put your passport in your suitcase?

Pinyin1: wǒ bǎ zuòyè zuò wán le 。
Chinese1: 我把作业做完了。
Translate1: I finished my homework.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī bǎ wǒ de míngzì dúcuò le 。
Chinese1: 老师把我的名字读错了。
Translate1: The teacher pronounced my name wrong.

Pinyin1: qǐng nǐ bǎ kèrén dàijìnqù 。
Chinese1: 请你把客人带进去。
Translate1: Please bring your guests in.

Pinyin1: qǐng bǎ wǒ de yǎnjìng ná guòlái 。
Chinese1: 请把我的眼镜拿过来。
Translate1: Please bring me my glasses.

Pinyin1: nǐmen bǎ nàgè wèntí jiějué le ma ？
Chinese1: 你们把那个问题解决了吗？
Translate1: Did you solve that problem?

Pinyin1: nǐ bǎ wǒ shǒujī fàngzài nǎr le ？
Chinese1: 你把我手机放在哪儿了？
Translate1: Where did you put my phone?

Pinyin1: tā bǎ qián jiègěi shéi le ？
Chinese1: 他把钱借给谁了？
Translate1: Who did he lend the money to?

Pinyin1: nǐ néng bùnéng bǎ nǐ fángjiān dǎsǎo gānjìng ？
Chinese1: 你能不能把你房间打扫干净？
Translate1: Can you clean your room?

Pinyin1: qǐng nǐ bǎ nà bǎ sǎn nágěi wǒ 。
Chinese1: 请你把那把伞拿给我。
Translate1: Please give me that umbrella.

Pinyin1: règǒu bèi nánhái chī le 。
Chinese1: 热狗被男孩吃了。
Translate1: The hot dog was eaten by the boy.

Pinyin1: règǒu bèi chī le 。
Chinese1: 热狗被吃了。
Translate1: The hot dog was eaten.

Pinyin1: tā bèi dǎ le 。
Chinese1: 他被打了。
Translate1: He was beaten.

Pinyin1: nǐ bèi gōngsī chǎoyóuyú le ？
Chinese1: 你被公司炒鱿鱼了？
Translate1: You got fired from the company?

Pinyin1: wǒ de shǒujī bèi tōu le 。
Chinese1: 我的手机被偷了。
Translate1: My phone was stolen.

Pinyin1: wǒ bèi tā piàn le 。
Chinese1: 我被他骗了。
Translate1: I was lied to by him.

Pinyin1: tā bèi jǐngchá zhuā le 。
Chinese1: 他被警察抓了。
Translate1: He was caught by the police.

Pinyin1: tā bèi fùmǔ mà le 。
Chinese1: 他被父母骂了。
Translate1: He was scolded by his parents.

Pinyin1: wǒ de chē bèi zhuàng le 。
Chinese1: 我的车被撞了。
Translate1: My car was hit.

Pinyin1: tāmen zuò de huàishì bèi fāxiàn le 。
Chinese1: 他们做的坏事被发现了。
Translate1: The bad things they did were discovered.

Pinyin1: wǒ de wénjiàn bèishān le 。
Chinese1: 我的文件被删了。
Translate1: My files were deleted.

Pinyin1: kāfēi bèi wǒ hē le 。
Chinese1: 咖啡被我喝了。
Translate1: I drank the coffee.

Pinyin1: kāfēi bèi wǒ hēwán le 。
Chinese1: 咖啡被我喝完了。
Translate1: I finished the coffee.

Pinyin1: nàxiē shū bèi jiè zǒu le ma ？
Chinese1: 那些书被借走了吗？
Translate1: Were those books borrowed?

Pinyin1: tā bèi shéi dǎ de ？
Chinese1: 他被谁打的？
Translate1: Who beat him?

Pinyin1: huāpíng bèi shuāisuì le 。
Chinese1: 花瓶被摔碎了。
Translate1: The vase was broken.

Pinyin1: háizi bèi tā fùmǔ sòng huíqu le 。
Chinese1: 孩子被他父母送回去了。
Translate1: The child was sent back by his parents.

Pinyin1: zhuōzi shàngfàng zhe yī běnshū 。
Chinese1: 桌子上放着一本书。
Translate1: There is a book on the table.

Pinyin1: dàtīng lǐ zhàn zhe yīxiē jǐngchá 。
Chinese1: 大厅里站着一些警察。
Translate1: There were some policemen standing in the hall.

Pinyin1: jiàoshì lǐ zuò zhe liǎngbǎiduōgè xuésheng 。
Chinese1: 教室里坐着两百多个学生。
Translate1: There are more than two hundred students sitting in the classroom.

Pinyin1: dìxiàshì lǐ duī zhe hěnduō jiù dōngxi 。
Chinese1: 地下室里堆着很多旧东西。
Translate1: Lots of old stuff in the basement.

Pinyin1: lóuxià tíngzhe jǐliàngchē 。
Chinese1: 楼下停着几辆车。
Translate1: There are several cars parked downstairs.

Pinyin1: xǐyījī lǐ shì yīxiē zàng yīfú 。
Chinese1: 洗衣机里是一些脏衣服。
Translate1: There are some dirty clothes in the washing machine.

Pinyin1: dàizi lǐ shì wǒ de wǔfàn 。
Chinese1: 袋子里是我的午饭。
Translate1: In the bag is my lunch.

Pinyin1: hézi lǐ shì nǐ de lǐwù 。
Chinese1: 盒子里是你的礼物。
Translate1: Inside the box is your gift.

Pinyin1: zhuōzi shàng shì zuótiān méi chī wán de cài 。
Chinese1: 桌子上是昨天没吃完的菜。
Translate1: On the table are the unfinished dishes from yesterday.

Pinyin1: xiǎng chī jiù chī 。
Chinese1: 想吃就吃。
Translate1: Eat as much as you want.

Pinyin1: xiǎng zǒu jiù zǒu bā 。
Chinese1: 想走就走吧。
Translate1: Just go if you want.

Pinyin1: xiǎng mǎi jiù mǎi ， bùyòng wèn wǒ 。
Chinese1: 想买就买，不用问我。
Translate1: Buy it if you want, don't ask me.

Pinyin1: bié hàipà ， xiǎng shuō jiù shuō 。
Chinese1: 别害怕，想说就说。
Translate1: Don't be afraid, just say what you want.

Pinyin1: xiǎng zuò jiù zuò ， kǎolǜ nàme duō gànmá ？
Chinese1: 想做就做，考虑那么多干吗？
Translate1: Just do what you want, why think so much?

Pinyin1: xiǎng qù nǎr jiù qù nǎr 。
Chinese1: 想去哪儿就去哪儿。
Translate1: Go wherever you want.

Pinyin1: xiǎng shénme shíhou lái jiù shénme shíhou lái 。
Chinese1: 想什么时候来就什么时候来。
Translate1: Come whenever you want.

Pinyin1: xiǎngdiǎn shénme jiùdiǎn shénme ， wǒ qǐngkè 。
Chinese1: 想点什么就点什么，我请客。
Translate1: Order whatever you want, I treat you.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē qián wǒ xiǎng zěnme huā jiù zěnme huā 。
Chinese1: 这些钱我想怎么花就怎么花。
Translate1: I can spend the money however I want.

Pinyin1: shéi dū xǐhuan měishí 。
Chinese1: 谁都喜欢美食。
Translate1: Everyone loves food.

Pinyin1: shéi dū kěyǐ jìn 。
Chinese1: 谁都可以进。
Translate1: Anyone can enter.

Pinyin1: shéi dū bù xiāngxìn tā shuō dehuà 。
Chinese1: 谁都不相信他说的话。
Translate1: No one believed what he said.

Pinyin1: tā de fángjiān lǐ nǎr dū shì zàng yīfú 。
Chinese1: 他的房间里哪儿都是脏衣服。
Translate1: His room was full of dirty clothes.

Pinyin1: wǒtàilěi le ， nǎr dū bùxiǎng qù 。
Chinese1: 我太累了，哪儿都不想去。
Translate1: I'm too tired to go anywhere.

Pinyin1: zài nǎlǐ jiànmiàn dūxíng 。
Chinese1: 在哪里见面都行。
Translate1: Meet anywhere.

Pinyin1: shénme shíhou dū kěyǐ 。
Chinese1: 什么时候都可以。
Translate1: anytime is fine.

Pinyin1: nǐ shénme shíhou lái dū huānyíng 。
Chinese1: 你什么时候来都欢迎。
Translate1: You are welcome anytime.

Pinyin1: shénme shíhou kāishǐ dū bùwǎn 。
Chinese1: 什么时候开始都不晚。
Translate1: It's never too late to start.

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng chī duōshǎo dū kěyǐ 。
Chinese1: 你想吃多少都可以。
Translate1: You can eat as much as you want.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē shì miǎnfèi de ， nǐmen ná duōshǎo dū méi wèntí 。
Chinese1: 这些是免费的，你们拿多少都没问题。
Translate1: These are free, you can take as much as you want.

Pinyin1: wǒ gēn tā shuō duōshǎo biàn dū méiyǒu yòng 。
Chinese1: 我跟他说多少遍都没有用。
Translate1: No matter how many times I told him it was useless.

Pinyin1: biéren zěnme xiǎng dū bù zhòngyào 。
Chinese1: 别人怎么想都不重要。
Translate1: It doesn't matter what other people think.

Pinyin1: tiānqì yuèláiyuè lěng le 。
Chinese1: 天气越来越冷了。
Translate1: The weather is getting cold.

Pinyin1: nǐ nǚér yuèláiyuè piàoliang le 。
Chinese1: 你女儿越来越漂亮了。
Translate1: Your daughter is getting more and more beautiful.

Pinyin1: nǐ shuō dé yuèláiyuè hǎo le 。
Chinese1: 你说得越来越好了。
Translate1: You are getting better at speaking.

Pinyin1: jìshù yuèláiyuè fādá le 。
Chinese1: 技术越来越发达了。
Translate1: Technology is getting better and better.

Pinyin1: kōngqìwūrǎn yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le 。
Chinese1: 空气污染越来越严重了。
Translate1: Air pollution is getting worse.

Pinyin1: wǒ yuèláiyuè xǐhuan shànghǎi le 。
Chinese1: 我越来越喜欢上海了。
Translate1: I like Shanghai more and more.

Pinyin1: nǐ yuèláiyuè liǎojiě wǒ le 。
Chinese1: 你越来越了解我了。
Translate1: You know me better and better.

Pinyin1: wǒ yuèláiyuè lǐjiě wǒ de fùmǔ le 。
Chinese1: 我越来越理解我的父母了。
Translate1: I understand my parents more and more.

Pinyin1: wǒ yuèláiyuè bù xiāngxìn tā le 。
Chinese1: 我越来越不相信他了。
Translate1: I don't trust him more and more.

Pinyin1: nǐ yuèláiyuè bù dǒng wǒ le 。
Chinese1: 你越来越不懂我了。
Translate1: You don't understand me more and more.

Pinyin1: wèile qián ， tā shénme dū yuànyì zuò 。
Chinese1: 为了钱，他什么都愿意做。
Translate1: For money, he is willing to do anything.

Pinyin1: wèile háizi de wèilái ， tā juédìng bān dào shànghǎi 。
Chinese1: 为了孩子的未来，他决定搬到上海。
Translate1: For the future of his children, he decided to move to Shanghai.

Pinyin1: wèile zhège miànshì ， tā mǎi le yītào hěnguì de xīfú 。
Chinese1: 为了这个面试，他买了一套很贵的西服。
Translate1: For this interview, he bought an expensive suit.

Pinyin1: wèile zhǎo línggǎn ， nàgè zuòjiā bāndào le nóngcūn 。
Chinese1: 为了找灵感，那个作家搬到了农村。
Translate1: In search of inspiration, the writer moved to the countryside.

Pinyin1: wǔnián qián ， wèile nǚpéngyou ， tā fàngqì le shànghǎi de gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 五年前，为了女朋友，他放弃了上海的工作。
Translate1: Five years ago, he gave up his job in Shanghai for his girlfriend.

Pinyin1: wèile jiǎnglì dàjiā ， gōngsī míngnián dài nǐmen qù rìběn lǚxíng 。
Chinese1: 为了奖励大家，公司明年带你们去日本旅行。
Translate1: To reward everyone, the company will take you on a trip to Japan next year.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhème zuò shì wèile bāng nǐ 。
Chinese1: 我这么做是为了帮你。
Translate1: I do this to help you.

Pinyin1: tā zuò jiānzhí shì wèile duō zhuàndiǎn qián 。
Chinese1: 他做兼职是为了多赚点钱。
Translate1: He works part-time to make more money.

Pinyin1: nǐxué zhōngwén shìyīnwéi nǐ de zhōngguó nǚpéngyou ma ？
Chinese1: 你学中文是因为你的中国女朋友吗？
Translate1: Did you learn Chinese because of your Chinese girlfriend?

Pinyin1: zhège rén wǒ zài nǎr jiànguò 。
Chinese1: 这个人我在哪儿见过。
Translate1: Where have I seen this person.

Pinyin1: zhè shǒugē wǒ zài nǎr tīngguò 。
Chinese1: 这首歌我在哪儿听过。
Translate1: Where have I heard this song.

Pinyin1: zhè piānwénzhāng wǒmen zài nǎr kànguò 。
Chinese1: 这篇文章我们在哪儿看过。
Translate1: Where did we read this article.

Pinyin1: nǐ ràng shéi lái bāng wǒ yīxià 。
Chinese1: 你让谁来帮我一下。
Translate1: Who do you ask to help me.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shì wǒ tīng shéi shuō guò 。
Chinese1: 这件事我听谁说过。
Translate1: I've heard of this from someone.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi zuò diǎnr shénme 。
Chinese1: 我们应该做点儿什么。
Translate1: We should do something about it.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng hē diǎnr shénme 。
Chinese1: 我想喝点儿什么。
Translate1: I want to drink something.

Pinyin1: shénme shíhou wǒmen jiànmiàn tán bā 。
Chinese1: 什么时候我们见面谈吧。
Translate1: Let's meet and talk sometime.

Pinyin1: shénme shíhou lái wǒ xīnjiā wánbā 。
Chinese1: 什么时候来我新家玩吧。
Translate1: Come to my new house to play sometime.

Pinyin1: wǒmen shénme shíhou qù kànkan tā bā 。
Chinese1: 我们什么时候去看看他吧。
Translate1: Let's go see him sometime.

Pinyin1: gēn qùnián bǐ ， nǐ de zhōngwén jìnbù le hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 跟去年比，你的中文进步了很多。
Translate1: Compared with last year, your Chinese has improved a lot.

Pinyin1: gēn shínián qiánbǐ qǐlai ， zhōngguó rén de shēnghuó shuǐpíng tígāo le hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 跟十年前比起来，中国人的生活水平提高了很多。
Translate1: Compared with ten years ago, the living standards of Chinese people have improved a lot.

Pinyin1: gēn shànggèyuè bǐ ， zhège yuè de gōngzuò hěn qīngsōng 。
Chinese1: 跟上个月比，这个月的工作很轻松。
Translate1: Compared with last month, this month's work is very easy.

Pinyin1: gēnqian jǐzhōu bǐ ， zhège xīngqī de tiānqì shūfu duō le 。
Chinese1: 跟前几周比，这个星期的天气舒服多了。
Translate1: Compared with previous weeks, the weather this week is much more comfortable.

Pinyin1: gēn gāng bìyè de shíhou bǐ qǐlai ， tā chéngshú le hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 跟刚毕业的时候比起来，他成熟了很多。
Translate1: Compared with when he just graduated, he has matured a lot.

Pinyin1: wǒ mèimei bǐ wǒ gēng shòu 。
Chinese1: 我妹妹比我更瘦。
Translate1: My sister is thinner than me.

Pinyin1: wǒ de māo bǐ wǒ de gǒu gēng táoqì 。
Chinese1: 我的猫比我的狗更淘气。
Translate1: My cat is naughtier than my dog.

Pinyin1: yǒushíhou dòngwù bǐ rénlèi gēng cōngming 。
Chinese1: 有时候动物比人类更聪明。
Translate1: Sometimes animals are smarter than humans.

Pinyin1: zhège dìfāng bǐ yǐqián gēng rènao le 。
Chinese1: 这个地方比以前更热闹了。
Translate1: The place is busier than ever.

Pinyin1: pīnyīn bǐ hànzì róngyì hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 拼音比汉字容易很多。
Translate1: Pinyin is much easier than Chinese characters.

Pinyin1: zuò gāotiě bǐ zuòfēijī fāngbiàn hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 坐高铁比坐飞机方便很多。
Translate1: Taking the high-speed rail is much more convenient than flying.

Pinyin1: zhège nǚlǎoshī bǐ nàgè nán lǎoshī yángé dé duō 。
Chinese1: 这个女老师比那个男老师严格得多。
Translate1: This female teacher is much stricter than that male teacher.

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎopó de gōngzī bǐ wǒ gāodé duō 。
Chinese1: 我老婆的工资比我高得多。
Translate1: My wife's salary is much higher than mine.

Pinyin1: nǐ bǐ wǒ yǒu jīngyàn duō le 。
Chinese1: 你比我有经验多了。
Translate1: You have more experience than me.

Pinyin1: nǐmen bǐ wǒmen xìngyùn duō le 。
Chinese1: 你们比我们幸运多了。
Translate1: You are much luckier than us.

Pinyin1: tā dǎlánqiú bǐ wǒ lìhai duō le 。
Chinese1: 他打篮球比我厉害多了。
Translate1: He is much better at basketball than me.

Pinyin1: wǒ de gǎnmào hǎoduō le 。
Chinese1: 我的感冒好多了。
Translate1: My cold is much better.

Pinyin1: zuìjìn tiānqì nuǎnhuo duō le 。
Chinese1: 最近天气暖和多了。
Translate1: The weather has been much warmer lately.
